m_szDocTitle: Documentation through a remote presence robot - InTouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Documentation through a remote presence robot United States Patent 8849680 Abstract: A robotic system that is used in a tele-presence session. For example, the system can be used by medical personnel to examine, diagnose and prescribe medical treatment in the session. The system includes a robot that has a camera and is controlled by a remote station. The system further includes a storage device that stores session content data regarding the session. The data may include a video/audio taping of the session by the robot. The session content data may also include
